channel.title: 2 Hard Errors I guess, reward pl0x?
channel.description:
I get thise errors, I can't fix, no one could fix as I asked else where. Guess rep++ this once for help :D? Gl :p (You can talk off rep, but not ask for it)
[code]
client.java:23976: orphaned case case 49024: // Xerozcheez: Player declines teleothr request, aww :( ^ client.java:24838: illegal start of expression private int somejunk; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

ugh im having the same problem, cant we just delete the whole case?

Then when the person declines a teleother request, nothing will happen.

item.source: 2 Hard Errors I guess, reward pl0x?

item.title: 2 Hard Errors I guess, reward pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Haha probably not… Try replacing them with the one’s in my slightly modified source;

[code]case 49022: // Xerozcheez: Player accepts teleother request

if(teleOtherScreen) {
client tele = (client) server.playerHandler.players[teleReq];

closeInterface();
tele.sendMessage(“You teleport the other player!”);
stillgfx(343, tele.absY, tele.absX);
stillgfx(342, absY, absX);
tele.setAnimation(711);
setAnimation(2239);

if(teleLoc.equals(“Camelot”)) {
sendMessage(“You are teleported to Camelot!”);
tele.addSkillXP(100, 6);
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if(teleLoc.equals(“Falador”)) {
sendMessage(“You are teleported to Falador!”);
tele.addSkillXP(75, 6);
teleportToX = 2964;
teleportToY = 3378;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if(teleLoc.equals(“Lumbridge”)) {
sendMessage(“You are teleported to Lumbridge!”);
tele.addSkillXP(50, 6);
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
heightLevel = 0;
}
teleOtherScreen = false;
}
break;

case 49024: // Xerozcheez: Player declines teleothr request, aww

if(teleOtherScreen) {
client tele2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[teleReq];
teleOtherScreen = false;
sendMessage(“You decline the request.”);
tele2.sendMessage(“The other player declined the tele other request”);
}
closeInterface();

break;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Hard Errors I guess, reward pl0x?

item.title: 2 Hard Errors I guess, reward pl0x?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

† Nirvana †:

probley missing a } or ‘break;’ or something…

If you were missing a “break;” you would have 100 errors. It’s probably a brace inbetween all the statements in the case he’s/she’s added.

[quote="-Legend-, post:4, topic:107885"][quote author=I Br3ndan I link=topic=154404.msg1453483#msg1453483 date=1181361786]
Paste me the case you’ve just added above that. Or anything for that matter you’ve added above that.
[/quote]

For the xero thing

[code]case 49022: // Xerozcheez: Player accepts teleother request

if(teleOtherScreen) {
client tele = (client) server.playerHandler.players[teleReq];

closeInterface();
tele.sendMessage(“You teleport the other player!”);
stillgfx(343, tele.absY, tele.absX);
stillgfx(342, absY, absX);
tele.setAnimation(711);
setAnimation(2239);

if(teleLoc.equals(“Camelot”)) {
sendMessage(“You are teleported to Camelot!”);
tele.addSkillXP(100, 6);
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if(teleLoc.equals(“Falador”)) {
sendMessage(“You are teleported to Falador!”);
tele.addSkillXP(75, 6);
teleportToX = 2964;
teleportToY = 3378;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if(teleLoc.equals(“Lumbridge”)) {
sendMessage(“You are teleported to Lumbridge!”);
tele.addSkillXP(50, 6);
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
heightLevel = 0;
}
teleOtherScreen = false;
}
break;

case 49024: // Xerozcheez: Player declines teleothr request, aww

if(teleOtherScreen) {
client tele2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[teleReq];
teleOtherScreen = false;
sendMessage(“You decline the request.”);
tele2.sendMessage(“The other player declined the tele other request”);
}
closeInterface();

break;
[/code]

and Public junk thingy…

interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int actionButtonId1 = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); println_debug("Unhandled packet ["+packetType+", InterFaceId: " +interfaceID+", size="+packetSize+"]: ]"+misc.Hex(inStream.buffer, 1, packetSize)+"["); println_debug("Action Button: "+actionButtonId1); break; } } private int somejunk; [/quote]

Ok… Have you been modifying those in any way?

Read full topic
